meanings.definition: To release more than one egg during a single menstrual cycle.
meanings.sent1: Some women may superovulate and release multiple eggs in one cycle.
meanings.sent2: Certain medications can help women superovulate and increase their chances of conception.
meanings.sent3: The ovaries decided to superovulate and surprise the body with extra eggs.
meanings.sent4: Her reproductive system seemed to superovulate like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained how some women naturally superovulate, leading to fraternal twins.

meanings.definition: The process of inducing a female animal to release multiple eggs at once.
meanings.sent1: Farmers use superovulation to increase the chances of successful breeding in cows.
meanings.sent2: The veterinarian explained the superovulation process to the curious students.
meanings.sent3: The zookeepers organized a superovulation event for the endangered species.
meanings.sent4: The concept of superovulation in animals fascinated the young biologist.
meanings.sent5: The research team studied the effects of superovulation on different species of birds.
